text:
The Lasso of Truth has proven to be quite durable. The only instance I can definitely state of it being snapped was by Bizarro in Batman/Superman/Wonder Woman: Trinity.

Bizarro’s contrary nature allows him to break free, though the reasoning behind it is worthy of a seminar.

It was also broken in the JLA storyline: “Golden Perfect”, though that was less from physical force than a philosophical crisis of truth:

It would seem that the only way to break the Lasso of Truth, in canon stories, is to subvert its enchantment of Truth.

title: How strong is Wonder Woman's lasso? Who has been able to break and/or escape its tangle?
